author: parithosh
content:
Hey everyone!

The Consensus-specs v1.1.8 (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.1.8) has some config renamings. I'd like to organise a update round for Kintsugi so everyone is on the same config again. 

Would it be possible for everyone to cut a release with the renaming by late next week? I can then do a round of updates and update the documentation as well.

author: bridge-bot
content: <tersec> Sure, Nimbus (unstable and kintsugi branches both) are on 1.1.8 already and held off for this reason on some of the externally visible config changes.

author: terence0083
content: +1. Prysm is already on v1.1.18. Let me make sure the latest docker images contain them
